text: Gregory S. Bell (born October 16, 1948) is an American Republican politician, real estate developer, and attorney. He was the seventh Lieutenant Governor of Utah from 2009 until 2013. He was a member of the Utah State Senate from 2003 until 2009. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Utah Category:Real estate developers Category:People from Ogden, Utah Category:Businesspeople from Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Greg Bell (politician)
